title: New Two Storied architecture Designed Modern Residence for Sale
details:
Popular sub-urban area in between Kiribathgoda & Wattala (2 km to each) 12 km from Colombo Closer to Highways. 15 ph block new two storied architecture designed modern residence with single storied annexure. Fully tiled. Situated in quite are, surrounded by green / fresh air & natural views. Walking distance to University of Kelaniya. Ideal for a professional family.

The annexure is already rented and ongoing therefore the buyer will be bale to generate income straightaway.

Large portion of the land also available beside the house...investors may also consider...

You would never want to miss this opportunity !!!

Email: rajitha7811@gmail.com
